Others: Reed Sheppard appeared in the game for six minutes in the first half.
Sheppard missed both of his attempts, including a 3-pointer.
He added one rebound and one assist but had a -7 plus/minus rating.
Udoka benched Sheppard after a short appearance.
Stephon Castle saw significant playing time despite the Spurs trailing early.
Castle hit crucial free throws, securing a 109-106 lead for the Spurs.
Despite the Rockets' comeback attempt, Sheppard did not play in the second half.
